title: Green Legend Ran
synopsis: A story of future Earth - A warning for mankind: In the future, our planet will be transformed into a strange new world where human life struggles on an Earth without rain or oceans - only vast, parched deserts.
voices: ['Yayoi, Mitsuki', 'Kikuchi, Hidehiro', 'Aono, Takeshi', 'Tomizawa, Michie', 'Yamaguchi, Ken', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Futamata, Issei', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Hazama, Michio']
